title: Automatic SOAP format structuring (Subjective, Objective, Assessment, Plan)
summary: SOAP Note Generation: Automatic SOAP format structuring (Subjective, Objective, Assessment, Plan)
description: Implement automatic SOAP note structuring that organizes transcribed clinical content into the standard SOAP format: Subjective (patient-reported information), Objective (observable findings), Assessment (diagnosis), and Plan (treatment plan).
